amendment.description: Amendment sought to permit the amount provided in the bill for voucher assistance to be reallocated by the Secretary of HUD to public housing modernization, drug elimination grants, and section 8 incremental rental assistance, if authorizing legislation is not enacted into law by December 31, 1995.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of July 26, as amendment No. 63, to permit the amount provided in the bill for voucher assistance to be reallocated by the Secretary of HUD to public housing modernization, drug elimination grants, and section 8 incremental rental assistance, if authorizing legislation is not enacted into law by December 31, 1995.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stokes amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 237 (Roll no. 588).
